What is a Single Page Template?: What is a Single Page Template?
Keep your site's visitors happy when the: Keep your site's visitors happy when they get lost by displaying your recent posts, a search bar, or any information that might help the user find what they were looking for.
A 404 page template allows you to easily: A 404 page template allows you to easily design the layout and style of the page that is displayed when a visitor arrives at a page that does not exist.
You can create multiple archive product: You can create multiple archive product templates, and assign each to different categories of products. This gives you the freedom to customise the appearance for each type of product being shown.
A products archive template allows you t: A products archive template allows you to easily design the layout and style of your WooCommerce shop page or other product archive pages - those pages that show a list of products, which may be filtered by terms such as categories, tags, etc.
You can create multiple single product t: You can create multiple single product templates, and assign each to different types of products, enabling a custom design for each group of similar products.
A single product template allows you to: A single product template allows you to easily design the layout and style of WooCommerce single product pages, and apply that template to various conditions that you assign.
You can customize the message if there a: You can customise the message if there are no results for the search term.
You can easily control the layout and de: You can easily control the layout and design of the Search Results page with the Search Results template, which is simply a special archive template just for displaying search results.
What is a Search Results Template?: What is a Search Results Template?
If you\u2019d like a different style for: If you’d like a different style for a specific category, it’s easy to create a separate archive template whose condition is to only display when users are viewing that category’s list of posts.
An archive template allows you to easily: An archive template allows you to easily design the layout and style of archive pages - those pages that show a list of posts (e.g. a blog’s list of recent posts), which may be filtered by terms such as authors, categories, tags, search results, etc.
You can create multiple single post temp: You can create multiple single post templates, and assign each to a different category.
A single post template allows you to eas: A single post template allows you to easily design the layout and style of posts, ensuring a design consistency throughout all your blog posts, for example.
You can create multiple single page temp: You can create multiple single page templates, and assign each to different areas of your site.
A single page template allows you to eas: A single page template allows you to easily create the layout and style of pages, ensuring design consistency across all the pages of your site.
You can create multiple footers, and ass: You can create multiple footers, and assign each to different areas of your site.
The footer template allows you to easily: The footer template allows you to easily design and edit custom WordPress footers without the limits of your theme’s footer design constraints
You can create multiple headers, and ass: You can create multiple headers, and assign each to different areas of your site.
The header template allows you to easily: The header template allows you to easily design and edit custom WordPress headers so you are no longer constrained by your theme’s header design limitations.
